arCallbacks.szOnCallbackCompleteScript:
function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	
	-- Script to free the villagers.
	UserFunction_FreeVillager(idActorGizmo, idSelf)
	
	-- After the first villager has said "thank you" have the summoner respond.
	Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(S_CONVO_VILLAGER_FREE)
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_INTRO, idSummoner)	
		
	-- Enable initial cultist spawners.	
	for i, idLinkedSpawner in ipairs(tWave01) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLinkedSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idLinkedSpawner, false)
		end
	end
	
	-- Enable demon spawners based on which cultist is active.
	
	local sWorldName = Hydra.ActorGetWorld(idActorPlayer)
	
	-- Caster Physical
	if Hydra.WorldIsDungeonStateActive(sWorldName, "DRLG_Spawner_Cultist_physical") then
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idCultPhysSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idCultPhysSpawner, false)
		end
	end
	
	-- Caster Fire
	if Hydra.WorldIsDungeonStateActive(sWorldName, "DRLG_Spawner_Cultist_fire") then
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idCultFireSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idCultFireSpawner, false)
		end
	end
	
	-- Caster Poison
	if Hydra.WorldIsDungeonStateActive(sWorldName, "DRLG_Spawner_Cultist_poison") then
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idCultPoisSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idCultPoisSpawner, false)
		end
	end		
	

end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)
	
	-- Script for freeing villagers.
	UserFunction_FreeVillager(idActorGizmo, idSelf)
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
	
	-- Have the summoner respond to the half way point.
	Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_HALFWAY, idSummoner)
	
	-- Start the next wavve of spawners.
	for i, idLinkedSpawner in ipairs(tWave02) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idLinkedSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idLinkedSpawner, false)
		end
	end
end

function Start(flTimeRemaining)

--Grabs a random number based on how many total captives there potentially are in the group.
--Sets the random villager based on that number in the group table.
--Sets a back up villager, the first one in the table, in the event the number used is no longer valid.
	local idNumber = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, 5)
	local idRandomVillager = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_CAPTIVES_GROUP)[idNumber]
	local idDefaultVillager = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_CAPTIVES_GROUP)[1]
	
--Checks for the random captive to be valid and alive, if not use the back up captive.
--Plays a conversation if the actor is valid.		
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idRandomVillager) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idRandomVillager) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_VILLAGER, idRandomVillager)	
	elseif 	Hydra.ActorIsValid(idDefaultVillager) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idDefaultVillager) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_VILLAGER, idDefaultVillager)
	end

end

function Start(flTimeRemaining)

--Grabs a random number based on how many total captives there potentially are in the group.
--Sets the random villager based on that number in the group table.
--Sets a back up villager, the first one in the table, in the event the number used is no longer valid.
	local idNumber = Hydra.GetRandomInt(1, 5) 
	local idRandomVillager = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_CAPTIVES_GROUP)[idNumber] 
	local idDefaultVillager = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_CAPTIVES_GROUP)[1] 
	
--Checks for the random captive to be valid and alive, if not use the back up captive.
--Plays a conversation if the actor is valid.	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idRandomVillager) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idRandomVillager) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_VILLAGER, idRandomVillager)	
	elseif 	Hydra.ActorIsValid(idDefaultVillager) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idDefaultVillager) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_VILLAGER, idDefaultVillager)
	end

end

function Start(idActorKiller, szGroup)

-- spawn chest
Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(ID_CHEST, false)

end

function Start()

	-- Disable all spawners
	UF_CleanupPrep(tAllSpawners)  
	
	-- Small pause when reaching this phase
	Hydra.Wait(1)

	-- Any villagers that are remaining will be transformed into demons.
	local tVillagers = Hydra.ActorsInGroup(S_CAPTIVES_GROUP)
	if bBonusAchieved == false then
		
		-- Activating the stakes so the ropes drop and then swapping them with the destrutable versions
		for i, idStake in ipairs(tStakes) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idStake) then
				Hydra.ActorGizmoOperate(idStake, idSelf, false)
				Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(S_STAKE_DST, idStake, false, 0, 0)
			end
		end

		-- Transforming the villagers
		for i, idVictim in ipairs(tVillagers) do
			if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVictim) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idVictim) then
				Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_VILLAGER_TRANSFORM_POWER, "TRANSFORM", idVictim)
			end
		end
		
		-- The summoner will taunt the player for failing.
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_FAILURE, idSummoner)
		Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(S_CONV_FAILURE)
	
		-- Turn on summoner AI and remove invulnerablity and shield vfx 
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idShield)
		Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idSummoner, true)
		Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idSummoner, false)
		Hydra.BuffRemove(S_GENERIC_IMMUNE, "IMMUNE", idSummoner)
		
	-- If the player suceeded then transform the summoner into an elite demon.	
	else
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONV_SUCCESS, idSummoner)
		Hydra.WaitForConversationFinished(S_CONV_SUCCESS)
		Hydra.Wait(0.5)
		UF_CasterTransform(idSummoner, idShield)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActor, fRange, idActorDetector)

	-- Set an escape marker so the NPC runs toward the direction the player came from.
	idEscapeLoc = Hydra.ActorSpawnActor(S_ACTOR_MARKER_LOCATION, idActor, false, 0,0)
end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)

	--Setting this so I can call the spawned summoner in scripts
	idSummoner = idActorSpawned  
	
	-- Disable the caster AI and set it invulnerable while it's shield is up
	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idActorSpawned, false)
	Hydra.ActorSetInvulnerable(idActorSpawned, true)
	Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_GENERIC_IMMUNE, "IMMUNE", idActorSpawned)
	
	-- SET UP ROPES
	for i, idVictim in ipairs(tLinkedVillagers) do
		tRopes[idVictim] = Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroupActorToActor( idActorSpawned, idVictim, VFX_VICTIM_ROPE, true )
	end

end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)

--Plays transform vfx on the monster that spawns after the villager "transforms"
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorSpawned, VFX_TRANSFORM)

end

function Start(idActorSpawned, idActorSpawner)

--Plays transform vfx on the monster that spawns after the cultist "transforms"
	Hydra.ActorPlayEffectGroup(idActorSpawned, VFX_TRANSFORM)

end

arCallbackSets.szOnSetCompleteScript:
-- Set bonus variable
	bBonusAchieved = true

-- Sets the DRLG designer variable so the chest encounter spawns the correct one.
	Hydra.SetGameVariableNumeric("DE_ChestRewardRare", 1)

szUserFunctionsScript:
-----------------------------
-- Free captured villagers --
function UserFunction_FreeVillager(idActorGizmo, idSource)
	local idCaptive = Hydra.ActorsLinkedByActor(idActorGizmo)[1]

-- The villager will play a conversation, have it's vfx removed, and run toward the escape location.
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idCaptive) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idCaptive) then
		Hydra.ActorPlaySimpleConversation(S_CONVO_VILLAGER_FREE, idCaptive)
		Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(idCaptive, idEscapeLoc, "IGC_NPC_Sprint_Fast", false)
		Hydra.ActorRemoveComplexEffect(idCaptive, tRopes[idCaptive])
		Hydra.ActorRemoveFromGroup(idCaptive, S_CAPTIVES_GROUP)
		Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(idCaptive, 1)
	end
	
-- Drain the summoner of some health every time a villager is rescued.	
	local nCurrentHP = Hydra.ActorGetHitPointsPercent(idSummoner)
	local nNewHP = nCurrentHP - 0.16
	Hydra.ActorSetHitPointsPercent(idSummoner, nNewHP)
end

------------------------------------
-- Turn summoner into elite demons --
function UF_CasterTransform(idCultist, idShield)

	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idCultist) and Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idCultist) then
		Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(S_CULTIST_TRANSFORM_POWER, "TRANSFORM", idCultist)
	end	
	
-- Delete the shield
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idShield) then
		Hydra.ActorDelete(idShield)
	end	
	
end

---------------------------------	
-- Disable spawners in a table --
function UF_CleanupPrep(tAllSpawners)

	for i, idAllSpawner in ipairs(tAllSpawners) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idAllSpawner) then
			Hydra.ActorGizmoSetDisabled(idAllSpawner, true)
		end
	end
end
szOnStartupScript:
-- ======= CONSTANTS =======
--	General
	S_USEREVENT_HALFWAYPOINT = "DE_Cultist_DemonVessel_Halfway"
	
-- Possible types of cultists that can spawn as the central one
	S_CULTIST_CASTER_F_BASE = Hydra.ReferenceActor("cultist_caster_female_poison")
	S_CULTIST_CASTER_M_BASE = Hydra.ReferenceActor("cultist_caster_male_poison")
	S_CULTIST_CASTER_F_DRYS = Hydra.ReferenceActor("cultist_caster_female_fire")
	S_CULTIST_CASTER_M_DRYS = Hydra.ReferenceActor("cultist_caster_male_fire")
	S_CULTIST_CASTER_F_FRAC = Hydra.ReferenceActor("cultist_caster_female_phys")
	S_CULTIST_CASTER_M_FRAC = Hydra.ReferenceActor("cultist_caster_male_phys")

-- ======= VARIABLES =======
--	General
	bBonusAchieved = false
	
-- Tables
	tRopes = {}

-- Set animation for tied up villagers	
	for i, idVillager in ipairs(tLinkedVillagers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idVillager) then
			Hydra.ActorSetAnimSetOverride(idVillager, S_ANIMSET_TIEDUP)
			Hydra.ActorEnableAI(idVillager, false)
		end
	end
